data.title: Churches A to Z
data.meta_description: An A-Z list of churches in Staffordshire This list is not exhaustive - please email us to tell us of any missing ones.  All denominations welcome - from CofE to Methodist chapels to Unitarian.  At the moment we are covering Christian & Jewish historic places of worship, but we hope to cover more in future.If…
data.text:
An A-Z list of churches in Staffordshire

This list is not exhaustive – please email us to tell us of any missing ones. All denominations welcome – from CofE to Methodist chapels to Unitarian. At the moment we are covering Christian & Jewish historic places of worship, but we hope to cover more in future.

If you know of estate-churches, or redundant, deconsecrated or converted former churches/chapels we are happy to list them too.

The list is in alphabetical order, by place name. Click on the church name to see its own page, and please use the comments box on that page if you have more information about the church. (Thanks to John Wallbridge for compiling the original list).

However… most of these pages are still incomplete: please see the Get Involved page to offer information to help us complete a page about a particular church.

Recommendations

The initials after the church names mean that they are ‘recommended to visitors’ in one or more of the leading books about English churches. For an explanation of which books these initials refer to, click here
